channel.title: Npc heads

item.title: Npc heads
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Well, I got the player heads to move while in dialouge…But the npc heads will not move or sometimes not even appear! Here’s one of the codes:

case 1001: // tutorial island start!2 sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("out! Once your done messing around,", 4903); sendFrame126("how about ya click on the door over there", 4904); sendFrame126("and follow the path to the Survival Expert", 4905); sendFrame126("to have a little talk about a few other things!", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; q7stage = 1; savemoreinfo(); break;

Any help?

Read full topic
